clean_data: Oracle Database Administrator Oracle span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Oracle Database Administrator Work Experience Oracle Database Administrator NFP Austin TX May 2016 to June 2019 DBA supporting major projects from Development to Production via Test and UAT environments Duties involve daily administration maintenance and tuning Database ranging from 100GB to 10TB Monitoring on OEM Database Table and schema refreshes using Data pump expdp and impdp and transportable tablespaces Experienced in cloning the databases using online and offline backups and using RMAN duplicate backup to migrate data from 11g to 112o3 Configured deployed and administered 2 and 3 node RAC clusters on Solaris 10 and Redhat Enterprise Linux 59 Extensively involved in performance tuning of applications SQL queries and databases using Explain Plan ASH ADDM SQL TRACE TKPROF and AWR reports Installation configuration and administration of Oracle Golden Gate Created a standby database using RMAN Duplicate in order to reduce the down time for the PROD database during the migration process Planning BackupRestoration Strategy Planning and scheduling Backups on crontab and OEM taking Logical Backups with ExportImport Data pump utilities implemented database security management by using the principle of least privilege and Provided technical support for all application administrators and users Applied critical patches to Oracle databases and application servers used Grid control OEM Grid to administer and manage large number of databases and enterprise wide targets Worked extensively on Performance tuning of Queries by maintaining Aggregates Compression partition indexing and use of Hints Stored outlines Statistics And PLSQL Tuning Responsible for setup and implementation of 2 Node RAC on Linux in 11g and 12c Implemented Data guard creating both logical and physical standby databases in 10g and 11g RAC environment for production database Experience in PeopleSoftOracle Database installation upgrade patching and migration Experience in Exadata cloud installation upgrade patching and migration from oracle 12c to Exadata cloud Involved in Exadata implementation monitoring upgrade patching and migration Configure and manage PeopleSoft running applications such as Finance HR SCM CRM Involve in upgrade and patching of Peoplesoft application Experience in configuring and managing EBusiness suite which integrates business CRM ERP AND SCM with applications such as HR FINANCE PROJECT PORTFOLIO AND PRECUREMENT Oracle DBA ESTESEXPRESS Richmond VA June 2013 to May 2016 Successfully installed and configured Oracle 11107 Oracle 12102 databases on Linux platforms Monitored different databases and application servers using Oracle Enterprise Manager OEM 12c Cloud Control Loading data from flat files to database using SQLLoader External Tables Extensively used AWR ADDM and explain plan for periodic performance tuning Implementing Data pump exportimport utility of Oracle 11g 10g for reorganizing DatabasesSchemasTables to improve the performance cloned using RMAN Trouble shooting and performance tuning golden gate replications monitoring scripts for Golden gate in Unix scripting Involved in Performance Planning and Tuning using baselines and proactive monitoring bottleneck elimination and the wait event interface to identify issues and generated weekly reports Implemented Flashback technology of the Oracle 11g 10g for a faster recovery of databases and database objects Performed full incremental backup cumulative and differential incremental updated using RMAN Successful in applying RDBMS patches security patches for improving the security and functionality of the databases as well as performing database upgrade Automated the processes like moving files managing alert log efficient backup by developing UNIX scripts Create database Objects Table spaces Schemas as needed Exposure to AWS migration and implementation Experience in installation migration monitoring patching and upgrade Exadata Exposure to sql server databases Installation upgrade migration monitoring performance and supporting users Hands on experience in Ebusiness suite application monitoring configuring and instalations Education Bachelors degree in environmental science Geology University of Buea Buea August 2008 to November 2011 Skills Database administration Database Ms sql server Sql server Oltp Oracle Oracle 10g Plsql Postgresql Sql Aix Linux Red hat Shell scripting Solaris Sun Unix Unix shell Ux Disaster recovery DBA PERFORMANCE TUNNING experience Database Memory and SQL Tuning using the AWR ASH ADDM EXPLAIN PLAN Six6 years of experience configuring and administering DATA GUARD for disaster recovery Configured both physical and logical standby databases Configured dataguard BROKER to ease the role transition Six6 years using RMAN backups recovery and cloning Six6 years of experience with MIGRATING from similar to different operating system such as Linux Red Hat AIX Solaris Windows using DATAPUMP GOLDENGATE TRANSPORTABLE TABLESPACE CREATE TABLE AS and many other strategies Six6 years working in OLTP and OLAP Environments Six6 years of experience MONITORING THE DATABASE WITH TOOLS TOAD SQL Developer OEM 12c Five5 Years of experience implementing SECURITY Auditing TDE Network Encryption Six6 years of experience UPGRADING PATCHING CPU and PSU Six6 years of experience managing Oracle GOLDENGATE both 11g and 12c I did both unidirectional and bidirectional configuration Six6 years of experience
